resources.string:
The Game is a 3-levelled awareness game. With each level a prerequisite before the next.
Each level contains;

i. Learning Content 
ii. Practice Questions 

• The questions in each of the levels are of different form which include; Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs), True or False, Scenario-Based Questions, Matching Questions, Visual Questions and Multiple-Answer Questions 

• Questions has a reward in form of mark. With 70% as pass mark before the player can proceed to the next level. Once the player got the pass mark. He/she will be rewarded with certain amount, in which will be used to perform the tasks of the quest at that level. Failure to get the pass mark will make the player to repeat the level.
Before you begin your journey, choose the path you wish to explore. Each path offers a unique learning experience and challenges. Select wisely!
In this section, you’ll embark on a journey to master ransomware awareness and cybersecurity. To proceed, you must successfully pass each level before unlocking the next.
